title: CodeCrack Web Application
description: Backend lead for a full-stack competitive coding platform. Built RESTful APIs in Python, implemented a Colyseus architecture for real-time matchmaking, integrated Django backend with PixiJS frontend, executed Python code securely using Piston, and designed modular OOP-based backend components for scalability.

title: NREL Energy Sector Analysis Tool
description: Developed a Python analytics tool using Pandas and NumPy to process over 5M+ energy grid data rows, connected MySQL databases for automated ingestion, conducted extensive unit testing, and implemented a binary-tree data architecture for O(log n) hierarchical analysis.

title: Hydrogen Business Case Prize Tool (NREL Competition)
description: Created a VBA-based modeling tool enabling CSV-to-Excel data loading and comprehensive business case simulation. Designed payback period and growth algorithms, integrated diverse datasets, and contributed to winning a national competition with $50,000 in awards.

title: BNY Mellon Document Processing Platform
description: Built a full-stack Angular + Spring Boot web application to process legal trade documents. Implemented HashMap-based metadata classification, MongoDB ingestion pipelines, RESTful API communication, CI/CD automation, and integrated with internal AI microservices.

title: Robot Program Website (BuildBots)
description: Developed and maintained an Umbraco-based website for robotics programs, including updates, scheduling, and parent/student portal functionality. Supported customer communication and technical troubleshooting.

title: SHPE Rocket Payload Developer
description: Designed and developed payload CONOPs for experimental rocket missions as part of SHPE's engineering team. Focused on feasibility, sensor integration, and operational planning.

title: Spinning LIDAR Drone
description: Developing a drone-mounted spinning LIDAR system using ultrasonic sensors on a rotating frame. Implementing environmental mapping algorithms, closed-loop control for RPM and altitude, custom serial communication protocols, and tuning Betaflight firmware to stabilize flight during real-time sensor operations.

title: Ultrasonic Distance Sensor
description: Designed a custom PCB in Fusion 360 for a multi-sensor ultrasonic system. Programmed embedded C firmware for real-time data acquisition from ultrasonic and light sensors, and developed LCD output visualization for dynamic sensor readings.
